t: Co-Creator Of The Comfy, A ‘Shark Tank’ Hit, Fights To Keep Company Afloat
s: December 26, 2022 - Shark Tank’s Barbara Corcoran helped The Comfy sell millions of its snuggly, wearable blankets. Then things started to unravel, and Corcoran sold out. Now its co-founder is trying to pay off debts and reenergize the brand.
